# glyvis

The goal of glyvis is to visualize everything in the `glycoverse`
ecosystem. Visualization is an essential part of data analysis. Human
beings are more sensitive to visual information than text and numbers.
Plotting helps us to understand the data better. `glyvis` provides a
unified interface for visualizing `glycoverse` data, including
statistical results, experiments, glycan biosynthesis pathways, and
more. It implements the
[`autoplot()`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/autoplot.html)
method for various `glycoverse` data structures. Just
[`autoplot()`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/autoplot.html)
it!

## Installation

You can install the latest release of glyvis from
[r-universe](https://glycoverse.r-universe.dev/glyvis)
(**recommended**):

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::repo_add(glycoverse = "https://glycoverse.r-universe.dev")
pak::pkg_install("glyvis")
```

Or from [GitHub](https://github.com/glycoverse/glyvis):

``` r
pak::pkg_install("glycoverse/glyvis@*release")
```

Or install the development version (NOT recommended):

``` r
pak::pkg_install("glycoverse/glyvis")
```

## Documentation

- ðŸš€ Get started:
  [Here](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/articles/glyvis.html)
- ðŸ“š Reference:
  [Here](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/index.html)

## Role in `glycoverse`

The main purpose of `glyvis` is to provide visualization for `glystats`
results. It implements
[`autoplot()`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/autoplot.html)
methods for each result class in `glystats`, so that the users can
visualize the results directly to get a quick overview. It also provides
some other visualization functions for `glycoverse` data structures,
such as
[`glyexp::experiment()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyexp/reference/experiment.html),
[`glyrepr::glycan_structure()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyrepr/reference/glycan_structure.html),
and others. This package is not intended to produce publication-quality
figures, but to provide a quick exploration of the data.

## Example

``` r
library(glyexp)
#> Warning: ç¨‹åºåŒ…'glyexp'æ˜¯ç”¨Rç‰ˆæœ¬4.5.2 æ¥å»ºé€ çš„
library(glyclean)
#> 
#> è½½å…¥ç¨‹åºåŒ…ï¼š'glyclean'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     aggregate
library(glystats)
library(glyvis)

exp <- auto_clean(real_experiment)
#> 
#> â”€â”€ Normalizing data â”€â”€
#> 
#> â„¹ No QC samples found. Using default normalization method based on experiment type.
#> â„¹ Experiment type is "glycoproteomics". Using `normalize_median()`.
#> âœ” Normalization completed.
#> 
#> â”€â”€ Removing variables with too many missing values â”€â”€
#> 
#> â„¹ No QC samples found. Using all samples.
#> â„¹ Applying preset "discovery"...
#> â„¹ Total removed: 24 (0.56%) variables.
#> âœ” Variable removal completed.
#> 
#> â”€â”€ Imputing missing values â”€â”€
#> 
#> â„¹ No QC samples found. Using default imputation method based on sample size.
#> â„¹ Sample size <= 30, using `impute_sample_min()`.
#> âœ” Imputation completed.
#> 
#> â”€â”€ Aggregating data â”€â”€
#> 
#> â„¹ Aggregating to "gfs" level
#> âœ” Aggregation completed.
#> 
#> â”€â”€ Normalizing data again â”€â”€
#> 
#> â„¹ No QC samples found. Using default normalization method based on experiment type.
#> â„¹ Experiment type is "glycoproteomics". Using `normalize_median()`.
#> âœ” Normalization completed.
#> 
#> â”€â”€ Correcting batch effects â”€â”€
#> 
#> â„¹ Batch column  not found in sample_info. Skipping batch correction.
#> âœ” Batch correction completed.

pca_res <- gly_pca(exp)
autoplot(pca_res)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-2-1.png)

# Package index

## Autoplot Methods

- [`autoplot(`*`<glyexp_experiment>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glyexp_experiment.md)
  : Plots for Experiments
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_anova_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_anova_res.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_kruskal_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_anova_res.md)
  : Plots for Multi-Group Differential Expression Analysis (DEA)
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_cc_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_cc_res.md)
  : Plots for Consensus Clustering
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_cor_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_cor_res.md)
  : Plots for Correlation Analysis
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_cox_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_cox_res.md)
  : Plots for Cox Proportional Hazards Model
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_go_ora_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_go_ora_res.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_kegg_ora_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_go_ora_res.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_reactome_ora_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_go_ora_res.md)
  : Plots for Enrichment Analysis
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_hclust_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_hclust_res.md)
  : Plots for Hierarchical Clustering
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_limma_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_limma_res.md)
  : Plots for Limma Result
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_oplsda_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_oplsda_res.md)
  : Plots for OPLS-DA
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_pca_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_pca_res.md)
  : Plots for Principal Component Analysis (PCA)
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_plsda_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_plsda_res.md)
  : Plots for PLS-DA
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_roc_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_roc_res.md)
  : Plots for ROC Analysis
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_tsne_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_tsne_res.md)
  : Plots for t-SNE
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_ttest_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_ttest_res.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_wilcox_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_ttest_res.md)
  : Plots for 2-Group Differential Expression Analysis (DEA)
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_umap_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_umap_res.md)
  : Plots for UMAP
- [`autoplot(`*`<glystats_wgcna_res>`*`)`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/autoplot.glystats_wgcna_res.md)
  : Plots for WGCNA

## Direct Plot

- [`plot_boxplot()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_boxplot.md)
  : Boxplot
- [`plot_corrplot()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_corrplot.md)
  : Correlation Plot
- [`plot_enrich()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_enrich.md)
  : Plot Enrichment Analysis Results
- [`plot_heatmap()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_heatmap.md)
  : Heatmap
- [`plot_logo()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_logo.md)
  : Logo Plot
- [`plot_oplsda()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_oplsda.md)
  : OPLS-DA Plot
- [`plot_pca()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_pca.md)
  : PCA Plot
- [`plot_plsda()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_plsda.md)
  : PLS-DA Plot
- [`plot_roc()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_roc.md)
  : ROC plot
- [`plot_tsne()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_tsne.md)
  : t-SNE Plot
- [`plot_umap()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_umap.md)
  : UMAP Plot
- [`plot_volcano()`](https://glycoverse.github.io/glyvis/reference/plot_volcano.md)
  : Volcano Plot
